body_html:
OK I git pull the tensorflow on Mac book. The System is OS X EI Capitan. With Nvidia GTX750
Cuda is 7.5 and Cudnn is 5
the repo commit is 6d04d60
I run the ./configure. After the cuda setting, there is an error that cuda_configure.bzl:409:18: function 'repository_rule' does not exist.

Then I delete the all repo and git clone a new one. The error also exist. The branch is on master.

Then I delete the all repo and git clone a new one. The error also exist. The branch is on master.
body:
OK I  git pull  the tensorflow on Mac book. The System is OS X EI Capitan. With Nvidia GTX750
Cuda is 7.5 and Cudnn is 5
the repo commit is 6d04d60 
I run the ./configure.  After the cuda setting,  there is an error that cuda_configure.bzl:409:18: function 'repository_rule' does not exist.

Then I delete the all repo and git clone a new one. The error also exist. The branch is on master.
